titles.title: Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.
Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

action.text: Without objection, the Chair laid before the House H. Res. 111.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Education and Labor
House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology

bill.summary: This resolution elects designated Members to specified standing committees of the House of Representatives.
